sentence.text: In parallel, we recently reported that positive regulation of I-kappaB kinase/NF-kappaB signaling-deficient mice present with cognitive and social deficits, hyperactivity and anxiety.

entity.text: positive regulation of I-kappaB kinase/NF-kappaB signaling

sentence.text: We generated Cc2d1b knockout (KO), positive regulation of I-kappaB kinase/NF-kappaB signaling/1b double heterozygous and double KO mice, then performed behavioral studies to analyze learning and memory, social interactions, anxiety, and hyperactivity.

entity.text: positive regulation of I-kappaB kinase/NF-kappaB signaling
